website_summaries.verdict: Best for kids age 9 and younger, these pads come in colors for boys and girls and provide good coverage for beginners.
pros: Includes one pair of knee pads, one pair of elbow pads, and one pair of wrist guards
Durable 4mm plastic plates with soft EVA padded, adjustable elastic band
Best for children ages 9 and younger
cons: May run small, so consider sizing up when ordering

customer_reviews.title: They work!  Great value for the money.
customer_reviews.text: My 2 yr old is very active. This winter, she is going to be snowboarding. I wanted to make sure that she had fun with minimal scrapes and bruises. The front yard tests went very well. She took to them immediately once we explained that they are there to prevent "boo-boos". As I was expecting based on the product description it's a bit big for her, but over clothes everything stays on and protects well.
customer_reviews.author: Dinelle Churin

customer_reviews.title: Great for most kids
customer_reviews.text: These are so cute and bright. My daughter loved them. Beware though of the fit. My 5 year old is in the 100% percentile for both her height and weight and the pads only barely fit around her knees.
customer_reviews.author: MomaboveAll

customer_reviews.title: Great value, durable, safe, fit my 5 year old
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these in a size medium for my 5 year old. They are a tiny bit big on him; however, i consider it nothing more than "growing room." I am very impressed with the durability and color combination. They fit well and arrive in a mesh bag that you can use to store the pads when they're not in use. My son LOVED them! He wore them all day - even when he wasn't skating. He even asked if he could wear them to bed with his pajamas tonight! Excellent product! Durability, fair pricing, excellent sizing, and safety features.
customer_reviews.author: CeeRex30

customer_reviews.title: Great fit- easy to wear!
customer_reviews.text: We use these for ice skating and they have worked great. My child is super skinny and these stay in place great. She has fallen a lot- and never complains of pain and never has any marks.
customer_reviews.author: Katie C.

customer_reviews.title: These pads do offer good protection and seem well made
customer_reviews.text: These pads do offer good protection and seem well made. My six year olds fit well into these pads, but the knee pads run slightly smaller than the elbow/wrist. I anticipate we'll only get another year or so out of the knee pads. Also, my boys greatly complained about the knee pads being itchy. They did not have any issue with the wrist/elbow pads.
customer_reviews.author: RR

customer_reviews.title: Cheap material but it gets the job done.
customer_reviews.text: Crappy plastic but it got the job done to protect my sons hands and elbows (we couldn't use the knee pads cause they were too small). You get what you pay for. Its cheap and so is the material but he only used it for a week or two while he was learning to ride his bike. He is big for a 5 year old (50ish inches and 60+ pounds).
customer_reviews.author: Kadivar

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is almost four and on the slender side, but these are adjustable so they are perfect! She loves them - they’re cute and comfortable. Looks just like the pictures and it’s a great price for all that you get.
customer_reviews.author: Bethany Burleson

customer_reviews.title: Provides great protection.
customer_reviews.text: These fit my 7 year old just right! Provides great protection.
customer_reviews.author: UtahMom

customer_reviews.title: Pads work well for my beginning bicycle riding daughter. ...
customer_reviews.text: Pads work well for my beginning bicycle riding daughter. The elastic on the knee pads rubbed a little sore spot on the back of her knee but other than that they work well. Maybe use with pants or leggings and not on bare skin.
customer_reviews.author: Bryappie

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and fit all of them great with growing ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my 5 year olds and 3 year old. Great quality and fit all of them great with growing room, except the wrist guards. The wrist guards are too big for my 3 year old and a smidge big for the 5 year olds.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fits a 4 and 5 year old
customer_reviews.text: Fits a 4 and 5 year old. They love wearing their safety gear. Got it to learn to ride a bike without training wheels.
customer_reviews.author: Red

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: We ordered these because they were specifically for smaller children. However, my 4 yr old is having to wear the elbow pads as knee pads and she is definitely not small for her age. They do serve there purpose but I have saw better quality out there. I guess you get what you pay for lol
customer_reviews.author: Brooke Harper

customer_reviews.title: Cheap materials and not well thought out design
customer_reviews.text: The plastic part of the pads were so stiff, and users have to bent to fit the knees. Otherwise it feels like you are wearing a plate around your knees. You get what you paid for.
customer_reviews.author: tg

customer_reviews.title: Great first pads
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to donate to a junior roller derby team! These will work great for small kids and offers a lot of protection for a great price!
customer_reviews.author: Bolsen

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase
customer_reviews.text: Great for the price. Our daughter likes it. It can get a bit uncomfortable depending how child attaches them but overall they were just as expected.
customer_reviews.author: Alexa

customer_reviews.title: Would highly recommend this set.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this set for our grand daughter's 7th birthday to go with the roller skates we gave her. This set will keep her from getting all banged up like we did when we were learning how to skate. Made well and will be used a lot. Would highly recommend this set.
customer_reviews.author: Spring Sherry

customer_reviews.title: Better safe than sorry!
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my 2 year old. She likes the color and it’s pretty simple and straight forward to put on. She wears for scootering, skating, & biking.
customer_reviews.author: Hauy Love

customer_reviews.title: Excellent buy!
customer_reviews.text: Price was right and the quality turned out to be very good. Was expecting cheap quality with the price. Fit perfect and worked well.
customer_reviews.author: Rachelle P.

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: We bought these for my daughter so that she could learn how to ride her bike without training wheels! She's learned how to read without a scratch and these made us feel so much better when she was trying!
customer_reviews.author: Alfred Levy

customer_reviews.title: Not for Bikes!
customer_reviews.text: I wish I had read the ad closer, and noticed it is not for bikes. The wrist guards are nice, but do not work for gripping handlebars of bikes. I imagine for skateboarding they are great!
customer_reviews.author: M. A. Weber

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Knee pads and elbow pads are good but hand gloves gives rashes to my daughter's hands.. a bit stiff for a 6 year old's soft hands..
customer_reviews.author: ND

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: They are very cute but also do what they are suppose to. My 5 year old is able to put them on her self. She has a lot less booboos now.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen Jones

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: These are great. Got these for my daughter for her birthday. I thought they'd be too big because she's very thin but with the adjustable velcro straps they fit perfect with room to grow. They're great quality and comfortable for her to wear without rendering her movement when she's riding her scooter, bike or rollerblading. Highly recommend these
customer_reviews.author: Jami Olney

customer_reviews.title: Fits Perfectly and Does the Job!
customer_reviews.text: My son was afraid to start roller skating with any protectors. Although he is pretty good at it he still opts for rather be safe than sorry. They are scratched up by now but protect and are strong.
customer_reviews.author: John Brown

customer_reviews.title: doable not great quality and NOT free returns so get the right size!
customer_reviews.text: Be careful which size you buy as to return these is about $6 so not worth it if you are not 100% sure the size....quality is not that great, they are doable if fit for $12 but i don't expect them to last long...wish I would have just gone to a store for this kind of thing and got higher quality ones that fit right.
customer_reviews.author: Busymom

customer_reviews.title: Little softer than the ground.
customer_reviews.text: May be good for high speed spills where abrasion over a great distance is needed but my 5 yr old is not going to be going that fast on roller skates. The Cordura is stiff and padding is too if there even is any.
customer_reviews.author: LDS

customer_reviews.title: Poorly made
customer_reviews.text: Super poorly made. Only had them for a few months and they are completely falling apart - to the point where they’re unusable.
customer_reviews.author: JW

customer_reviews.title: Beware: Very Small
customer_reviews.text: Sizing says for 6-8 year olds. Most likely it’s for really small 6/7 year olds because a small 8 year old was almost crying with pain—due to an ill fit. Otherwise, it gets the job done.
customer_reviews.author: jfstanton

customer_reviews.title: 6 year old seemed to like them
customer_reviews.text: They fit well but we haven't seen the 6 year old girl we bought them for use them outside. Just inside the house. But she was able to move and seemed fine.
customer_reviews.author: TheOriginalPancake

customer_reviews.title: Good fit for a 6 year old
customer_reviews.text: My grandson is thrilled with this protective gear. I ordered him a size Medium since the small was for ages 2-6 and definitely too small for him. I have a photo and the gear seems to fit him very well.
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn Kingsbury

customer_reviews.title: cute color
customer_reviews.text: My daughter like the pink color. she is used for iceskating and it works very well.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Just ok
customer_reviews.text: These dont really provide a ton of protection. For basic falls at low speeds they probably would be fine, but for anything else i’d look elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Washingadog

customer_reviews.title: size S
customer_reviews.text: My 5 yr old is about 40 pounds and these fit perfect (size S).... I bought the red ones and they look really nice too.... Also bought the adjustable skates here on amazon and the whole set is beyond perfect!!!!
customer_reviews.author: JayeRocka

customer_reviews.title: Pads important for using skooter
customer_reviews.text: This set is cute and my granddaughter likes it. I give it only 4 stars because it is somewhat stiff and therefore a little uncomfortable. I feel much better with her wearing padding. She also wears it on her skooter.
customer_reviews.author: cmitch

customer_reviews.title: they were sturdy and look great
customer_reviews.text: they were sturdy and look great. But for some reason they don't seem to "Fit" perfectly on my 3 year old son even though I ordered Small and he is not a big guy
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Reader

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: This was a present for my niece! Very durable and easy for her to put on by herself!
customer_reviews.author: Renae

customer_reviews.title: Get it!
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Crash tested several times already and no issues found! Very durable! Knee pads seem a little small. Other items fit perfect
customer_reviews.author: Emily Gardner

customer_reviews.title: I like the look and the style
customer_reviews.text: I purchased them for my 6 year old daughter to wear when she rides her bike and skating. They are so stylish and she loves them!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: you get what you pay for I guess
customer_reviews.text: My daughter complained immediately after putting them on. The were very itchy on her and kept scratching her. They aren’t very sturdy either.
customer_reviews.author: LenaBean

customer_reviews.title: Size inaccurate
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a size up for my 4 year old and the knee pads were too tight. She has skinny legs so I figured the size up would work well. Not at all
customer_reviews.author: ShelH

customer_reviews.title: Just keeping mom happy
customer_reviews.text: Just what the boys need to skate and keep mom happy
customer_reviews.author: Ed

customer_reviews.title: Fit well
customer_reviews.text: Fit my 5 year old great. He loves them for skateboarding! Great value for thr money
customer_reviews.author: Brittni W.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent low budget protection
customer_reviews.text: Bought these to teach my 4 year old to ride a bike. He had a fall and the protected him perfectly. You can't beat the price and performance
customer_reviews.author: Uther

customer_reviews.title: Just what the doctor ordered
customer_reviews.text: Protects knees hands and elbows which is great first day our 5yr. old stopped to quickly and off she flew, no scrapes, no owes and no crying and no bandaids. Too many parents just don't think of this kind of protection but when one child has them others start to appear which helps everyone. These are high quality compared to some we've seen in stores, fully adjustable straps and Velcro Keep the kids safe.
customer_reviews.author: Blue Jacket

customer_reviews.title: Good but not great
customer_reviews.text: Good but not great. The hand gloves are really awesome and provide great protection for biking or skating. The velcro quality is not great.
customer_reviews.author: Rizwan Kazmi

customer_reviews.title: These were a Christmas gift for our daughter and they ...
customer_reviews.text: These were a Christmas gift for our daughter and they are coming in very handy with her new skateboard. They fit well and she doesn't complain about them rubbing.
customer_reviews.author: David Farrar

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good quality pads. Colors go great with my son's new rollerblades.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie McFarland

customer_reviews.title: Sub-par quality - you get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: Fairly thin and flimsy and isn't designed to accommodate the bend of the elbows or knees. Returned this as I'd rather pay more for better quality.
customer_reviews.author: Andrej Gombar

customer_reviews.title: Not suitable for 3 year old
customer_reviews.text: For some reason this is little loose for 3 year old boy
customer_reviews.author: Prince Sam

customer_reviews.title: Nice Pads
customer_reviews.text: They run a little small - Medium fit my 7 year old niece well.
customer_reviews.author: Wulfgar

customer_reviews.title: Cute and works
customer_reviews.text: My daughter likes that they match her board and skates. I like that they are sturdy and hard.
customer_reviews.author: ana

customer_reviews.title: Nice pads for the price
customer_reviews.text: For the price can't go wrong for a little guy. The do alright for my three year old
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed
customer_reviews.text: Pretty cheap, fabric is as thin as possible and sticking is weak. These do not form or fit well to a kid.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works fine and easy for my 8 year old to use
customer_reviews.text: Works fine and easy for my 8 year old to use, but I was deeply disappointed by how cheaply made these items come across.
customer_reviews.author: tasha

customer_reviews.title: Decent fit
customer_reviews.text: These are cute bc they’re pink... but the wrist guards are too bulky for small hands & the all around fit of the knee and elbow pads seems odd! Does the job but not the greatest fit!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Zaz

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Nice for the $ comes with everything you need my son is 6 and fits great
customer_reviews.author: emk

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Grandaughter is petite ... 7 yrs old.. Works good for her..
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good quality but the size doesn’t much for small kids.
customer_reviews.text: The product is durable however the elbow & knee protector is too big for my 8 y/o kid.
customer_reviews.author: Grace Campos

customer_reviews.title: Do not provide adequate padding
customer_reviews.text: These are very hard and do not provide cushioning needed to minimize injury, such as bruising from falling.
customer_reviews.author: Christine S. Johnston

customer_reviews.title: Does what you need it to
customer_reviews.text: Great product and provides the needed protection for my kid
customer_reviews.author: Dima1518

customer_reviews.title: Cheap and poorly built together
customer_reviews.text: Easy to wear but it’s very cheap. Most parts got the plastic detaching from the cushions after few times use
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Great for bike riders.
customer_reviews.text: These are amazing my daughter loves these so much when she is riding her bike.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Schallert

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Well made! Comfortable! My daughter likes these better than any other set she has had.
customer_reviews.author: Brandie N Dodd

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very rigid and don't fit well around my 4y/o knees/elbows.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: 3 wheel scooter for a 3 year old
customer_reviews.text: The scooter was a present for my granddaughter (turned 3) and she loves it. She got on it right away and did fine but I don’t know if she is aware of the brake yet. The lights on the wheels were definitely a plus
customer_reviews.author: TerryA

customer_reviews.title: Awkward fit.
customer_reviews.text: An Awkward fit for six year old. It’s hard to adjust it to be comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: YSP

customer_reviews.title: Effective
customer_reviews.text: Great purchase. Plenty of protective material. Easy on and off for my six year old grandson.
customer_reviews.author: Black Kat

customer_reviews.title: Great fit!!
customer_reviews.text: Fit my 3-year old niece perfectly! Great coverage and seem to be pretty durable. Definitely a good product for her introduction to skateboarding safely!!
customer_reviews.author: Linnea

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality; Would not recommend.
customer_reviews.text: One of the straps on the knee pads broke within 1 day. Also, the elbow pads hurt really bad.
customer_reviews.author: GregInTennessee

customer_reviews.title: Fit nicely and are easy to put on and remove
customer_reviews.text: Fit nicely and are easy to put on and remove
customer_reviews.author: Teta

customer_reviews.title: Great set of skate pads!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for an 8 year old's birthday- it came in a nice red mesh bag and fit him well!
customer_reviews.author: LNK

customer_reviews.title: Decent pair of gloves.
customer_reviews.text: Worked well for my gardening and mowing the lawn. My finger nails don't rip them as some gloves have. They fit as expected.
customer_reviews.author: William & Alicia Hoy

customer_reviews.title: But them
customer_reviews.text: I can’t tell for sure what I don’t like of the overall look but they seem to fit good and protect as expected.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money AT ALL
customer_reviews.text: The pads were not well made at all, the velcro come right off when we use it the first time!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Safe and cute safety pads
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves her pads for her roller skates. And I feel like she’s very well protected. They are simple enough for her to put on herself which I like.
customer_reviews.author: Vgh

customer_reviews.title: Sizing is a bit odd
customer_reviews.text: The wrist guards were a bit too big, and the knee pads too small. My child is a typically sized 3.5yr old. I wouldn’t purchase these again due to sizing issues.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Blake

customer_reviews.title: Price and quality
customer_reviews.text: For the price is a excllent choise. The quality is very good, the only is the color, didn't find red or fucsia color
customer_reviews.author: Raul R.

customer_reviews.title: safety first!
customer_reviews.text: We have these in the trunk with the Ripstick where ever we go!

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Not as quality as I think but works as intended.

customer_reviews.title: The pads offer protection while my grandson rides his bicycle.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased for my grandson for Christmas 2019. He enjoys the protection of the pads while riding his bicycle.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Kids love it and no issues. You get what you are looking for.

customer_reviews.title: Overall, very good

customer_reviews.title: it was what i expected,

customer_reviews.title: These all fit her really well and the quality is good.
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is a big 5 year old - about a size 7 and 50 lbs., These all fit her really well and the quality is good.

customer_reviews.text: No complaints, they fit great, and very durable. Great purchase 👍

product_meta.title: Kids Knee Pads and Elbow Pads with Wrist Guards Protective Gear Set for Skating Rollerblading Skateboard BMX Scooter Cycling
feature_bullets: The knee elbow pads with wirst guards are designed for kids girls and boys, fit for skating,rolling,cycling,biking,Skateboard Hoverboard and other sports

Size of Protective Gear set :Size S Suggest for 2-5 years old.;Size M Suggest for 6-8 years old, Magic stick to modify the size.Knee pad Size:15*11.5cm(L*W); Elbow pad Size:13.5*9.5cm; Wrist Pad Size:16*8cm(L*W) Fit for: Knee girth 19-26.5cm;Elbow girth 17-22.5cm
SPORTS ACTIVITIES: Suitable for Skateboard, Biking,skating,rolling,cycling, Mini Bike Riding and Other Extreme Sports.
Protective Gear set as Gift for Kids Girls and Boys that like Sport skating,rolling,cycling,biking,Skateboard Hoverboard and other sports.Keep them from Injury During Harsh Condition.
Package included :cycling/ skating protective pads set 6pcs(2 pcs knee pads+2 pcs wrist pads+2 pcs elbow pads)
